directions: Combine amaretto liqueur, coffee-flavored liqueur, raspberry-flavored liqueur, and ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Cover, shake, and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberries.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce coffee-flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua®)
1 fluid ounce raspberry-flavored liqueur (such as St. George Spirits®)
title: Raspberry Lady Martini
